mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_review( product_id, user_id, review_content, review_time, appraise, picture ) VALUES ( #{product_id}, #{user_id}, #{review_content}, #{review_time}, #{appraise}, #{picture} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_review SET reply = #{reply}, reply_time=DATE(NOW()) WHERE t_review.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select re.id id, re.appraise appraise, re.review_content review_content, re.review_time review_time, re.product_id product_id, pr.name name, pr.color color, pr.image image, pr.price price, pr.specifications specifications, pv.picture picture from t_review re left join t_picture_video pv on re.id= pv.review_id left join t_product pr on pr.id = re.product_id WHERE re.user_id=#{user_id} ORDER BY re.review_time DESC limit #{page},#{limit}
SELECT avg(re.appraise) appraise FROM t_review re WHERE re.product_id=#{id}

SELECT re.id id, re.appraise appraise, re.review_content review_content, re.review_time, re.reply reply, re.reply_time reply_time, u.nickname nickname, u.avatar avatar, pr.name name, pv.picture picture from t_review re left join t_picture_video pv on re.id= pv.review_id left join t_product pr on pr.id = re.product_id left join t_user u on re.user_id=u.id WHERE re.product_id=#{product_id} ORDER BY re.review_time DESC limit #{page},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT re.id) count FROM t_review re WHERE re.product_id=#{id}

SELECT re.id id, re.appraise appraise, re.review_content review_content, re.review_time, re.reply, re.reply_time, re.product_id product_id, u.nickname nickname, u.avatar avatar, pr.name name, pr.color color, pr.image image, pr.price price, pr.specifications specifications, pv.picture picture from t_review re left join t_picture_video pv on re.id= pv.review_id left join t_product pr on pr.id = re.product_id left join t_user u on re.user_id=u.id WHERE re.id=#{id}

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(re.id) count FROM t_review re,t_product pr,t_user u
re.product_id=pr.id AND re.user_id=u.id
AND u.nickname like "%"#{nickname}"%"
AND re.id = #{id}
